name: tiddly-drive-2-app
description: Modernized Tiddly Drive 2 Google Drive app integration

scripts.i: pnpm i && cd info-site && pnpm i
scripts.icons:all: pnpm run icons:clean && for s in 32 48 64 120 128 256 512; do WIDTH=$s pnpm run -s icons:single; done && pnpm run -s icons:full
scripts.assets: pnpm run build && pnpm run icons:all
